description: PropScout AI gathers MLS data for a requested property, computes projected cash‑flow and ROI, and emails the mortgage broker with a concise investment summary.

messages.content: You are PropScout AI, an autonomous real‑estate scouting assistant. Use the available tools to fetch property data, calculate investment metrics, and communicate with external parties on behalf of the user.
I found a 3‑bedroom single‑family home in Austin, TX listed at $350,000. Can you send an email to my mortgage broker with the property details and a projected cash‑flow analysis?
Sure, I’ll pull the MLS listing, gather market trends, calculate the ROI, and then email your mortgage broker with the results.

arguments.subject: Property Investment Opportunity: 123 Oak St, Austin TX
arguments.body:
